name: How to use the sandbox - Sharing
description: This tutorial will show how to share your creation in the sandbox using a url that other people can open.

pages.textBefore: To share a simulation, press the share button in the top right corner and copy the url.
pages.textAfter: In the image, the circled button is the share button and the arrow points to the copy url button. Press it and paste the link elsewhere to share it with someone.
